tool_description: Verifies imaging equipment calibration status and quality control metrics to ensure optimal image acquisition.

equipment_id.description: Unique identifier for the imaging equipment

modality_type.description: Equipment modality: CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound, nuclear_medicine, fluoroscopy

error_messages: Equipment ID not found: The specified equipment ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid modality type: Use one of [CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound, nuclear_medicine, fluoroscopy].
Calibration expired: Equipment calibration has expired and requires immediate attention.
Quality control failure: Equipment has failed recent quality control tests and is not suitable for patient imaging.
Equipment offline: The specified equipment is currently offline or under maintenance.
usage: Provide the equipment_id and modality_type to check calibration status and quality control metrics.

calibration_valid.description: Whether the equipment calibration is current and valid

next_calibration_due.description: ISO 8601 date when next calibration is due

qc_status.description: Quality control status: passed, failed, pending, overdue

equipment_ready.description: Whether equipment is ready for patient imaging
